summary: This dataset contains observations made by the Institute of Ocean Sciences of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) using current meters mounted on moorings. The moorings were deployed by DFO and partner organizations between 1965 to present. Variables present in the dataset include Current speed and direction, Temperature, Depth, and Pressure as a timeseries. For any questions please contact (DFO.PAC.SCI.IOSData-DonneesISO.SCI.PAC.MPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca).
title: Moored current meter data from IOS
institution: Institute of Ocean Sciences, 9860 West Saanich Road, Sidney, B.C., Canada
comment: Data converted from IOS ASCII format
